New York City is bracing for chilly Thanksgiving weather with wind gusts up to 35 mph, while Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani has requested the resignation of 179 staffers from the previous administration, amidst ongoing discussions about civil lawsuits for sex abuse claims and new regulations on AI and rent-setting algorithms.

### Risks & Alerts

- NYC area poised for 35 mph wind gusts and chilly temperatures on Thanksgiving. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMimAFBVV95cUxNa3ZKcEdZck9sRUUwaDYzLUpPUGp3M0x3VE81dnpPMlVDb21yY1FndDhRT05haDVTTURzc3o5cUtJZXVpNTdnWm44c2dLXzNmbTN6eEI1eXk0cUgyellOUkZSTVRnSkR6OE9EcnlONVBKMVFDNGJaeGZCTHNpR29LdkFRWk5qNTJWRmxPQXJaRzFDVE5vVTh3Qw?oc=5)

### Civics & Politics

- NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani requests resignations from 179 staffers of outgoing Mayor Eric Adams. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
